name: Dark Flareon
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: A Pokémon with a hot temper that can’t be controlled once it’s angered. Capable of breathing flames hotter than 3000°.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Dark Flareon.

attacks.name: Playing with Fire
attacks.effect: Use this attack only if there are any {R} Energy cards attached to Dark Flareon. Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 of those Energy cards and this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage.
